metadata.title: CVE-2021-47158 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: dsa: sja1105: add error handling in sja1105_setup()If any of sja1105_static_config_load(), sja1105_clocking_setup() orsja1105_devlink_setup() fails, we can't just return in the middle ofsja1105_setup() or memory will leak. Add a cleanup path.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
